I will post some videos of all of my stuff as soon as I can, but I 
have so=
me things to do and unfortunately there is no much time left to 
do my favo=
rite NE experiments :/ And there are so many things to do! 
I do have one v=
ideo, though, it is a demo of the NEAT co-evolution 
(not HyperNEAT, just r=
egular NEAT). 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3DLqUFJhkIqnI
OK let me tell =
you about the other thing. I do not evolve 3D shapes 
yet. Just 2D. I am ac=
tually working on a new project that does much 
better than the previous on=
e. Imagine the CPPN picture as a vector 
field, where you query the CPPN fo=
r the velocity of a vertex in a 
space. It is like you inflate a balloon in=
 space. This way whole 3D 
meshes can be built with CPPNs. It is actually v=
ery similar to the 
work of Erin Hastings, where he uses CPPNs to control p=
article 
systems. I need some more time before I release that thing. But I =

appreciate your interest. 

Peter
